cui_name: Ectopia Lentis with Ectopia of Pupil
reasoning: Ectopia lentis with concomitant pupil ectopia is an extremely rare ocular condition. Often associated with connective tissue disorders (Marfan, Ehlers-Danlos, homocystinuria) or developmental anomalies. Estimated <0.01 per 100k based on case frequency.
